Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Letts \Letts\ (l[e^]ts), n. pl.; sing. {Lett} (l[e^]t). (Ethnol.) An Indo-European people, allied to the Lithuanians and Old Prussians, and inhabiting a part of the Baltic provinces of Russia. [1913 Webster]
